summary.span: Provides text writer functionality for devices targeted by the XHTML adapter set, including Extensible Hypertext Markup Language (XHTML), XHTML Mobile, and Wireless Markup Language (WML).

span.span: Provides text writer functionality for devices targeted by the XHTML adapter set, including Extensible Hypertext Markup Language (XHTML), XHTML Mobile, and Wireless Markup Language (WML).

summary.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XHTML 是基于 HTML 4.1 并允许您创建的 Web 站点适用于多个设备类型符合 XML 的标记。XHTML is an XML-compliant markup that is based on HTML 4.1 and allows you to create Web sites suitable for multiple device types. 它将合并 HTML 的易用性与 XML 的严格元素准则，以生成标记语言，采用各种格式和样式选项一起使用，并减少标记多义性。It merges HTML's ease of use with XML's strict element guidelines to produce a markup language with a wide range of format and style options and reduced markup tag ambiguity. 此类提供 ASP.NET 服务器控件内容 XHTML 呈现给客户端时所使用的格式化功能。This class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering XHTML content to clients. 呈现符合标准的三种不同的 XHTML 文档类型的标记：XHTML Basic，它支持有限的样式和格式元素;XHTML 移动配置文件，它支持内联样式表;和 WML 2.0，也不能基于 XHTML 1.1 支持级联样式表。The renders markup that meets the standards of three different XHTML doc types: XHTML Basic, which supports limited style and format elements; XHTML Mobile Profile, which supports inline style sheets; and WML 2.0, which is based on XHTML 1.1 and supports cascading style sheets. 此类主要由自定义移动页面和控件适配器的开发人员使用。This class is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters. 类可以呈现所有 HTML 元素、 特性和样式属性，但是，与类中，不允许的这些标记元素的标题大小写。The class can render all HTML elements, attributes, and style attributes, but, unlike the class, does not allow title capitalization of these markup elements. 实例化，并根据目标设备的功能，初始化多个属性，如， ，和，有助于在呈现页面的文本编写器并将其控件。An instantiates an and depending on the capabilities of the target device, initializes a number of properties, such as , , and , that assist the text writer in rendering the page and its controls. 您的适配器可以使用多种方法来应用样式和控件格式设置：Your adapter can use a variety of methods to apply styles and control formatting: - 和， and , - 和，和 and , and - 和 。 and . > [!NOTE] > 此类派生自类，后者又派生类，且其大部分功能由这些基类的类提供。This class derives from the class, which in turn derives from the class, and much of its functionality is provided by these base classes. 可以使用此类的成员和它所继承的任何成员类中，以创建自定义文本编写器来使用自定义 XHTML 页中或在类适配器中。You can use the members of this class, and any members it inherits from the class, to create custom text writers to use in a custom XHTML page or in class adapters. 此外可以创建新的派生的类重写的标准行为的类。You can also create new derived classes that override the standard behavior of the class. 设备筛选是为了使用特定的适配器或文本编写器的服务器控件必需的。Device filtering is required in order to use a specific adapter or text writer for a server control. 有关设备筛选的详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))并[设备筛选概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19(v=vs.100))。For more information about device filtering, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)) and [Device Filtering Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本编写器是由特定的目标设备的相应页适配器实例化，则页适配器和适配器用于每个页面上的控件。Text writers are instantiated by a corresponding page adapter for a specific target device, and then used by the page adapter and the adapters for each control on the page. 此类主要由自定义移动页面和控件适配器的开发人员使用。This class is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些设备不允许内联样式中的元素，但需要样式信息，以提供从链接的样式表。Some devices do not allow inline styles in elements, but require style information to be provided from a linked style sheet. 如果链接的样式表存储在，则 URL 会包含一个唯一，它标识要返回的样式表。If the linked style sheet is stored in the , the URL contains a unique that identifies the style sheet to return. 对于这些目标设备，将样式信息呈现控件从到样式表的缓存。For these target devices, the moves style information from rendered controls to a style sheet for caching. 页适配器可以指示以保存中的样式表使用，或在使用之前呈现页面。A page adapter can instruct the to save the style sheet in the using , or in the using before rendering the page. 此属性主要由自定义移动页面和控件适配器的开发人员使用。This property is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些设备不允许内联样式中的元素，但需要样式信息，以提供从链接的样式表。Some devices do not allow inline styles in elements, but require style information to be provided from a linked style sheet. 如果链接的样式表存储在，则 URL 会包含一个唯一，它标识要返回的样式表。If the linked style sheet is stored in the , the URL contains a unique that identifies the style sheet to return. 对于这些目标设备，将样式信息呈现控件从到样式表，以便在进行缓存。For these target devices, the moves style information from rendered controls to a style sheet for caching in the . 页适配器可以指示以保存中的样式表使用，或在使用之前呈现页面。A page adapter can instruct the to save the style sheet in the using , or in the using before rendering the page. 此属性主要由自定义移动页面和控件适配器的开发人员使用。This property is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页适配器调用此方法，具体取决于`type`，写入以下文档类型声明：The page adapter calls this method, and depending on the `type`, writes the following document type declarations: |类型Type|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||`<\!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML Basic 1.0//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml-basic/xhtml-basic10.dtd">`| ||`<\!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//WAPFORUM//DTD XHTML Mobile 1.0//EN" "http://www.wapforum.org/DTD/xhtml-mobile10.dtd">`| ||`<\!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//WAPFORUM//DTD WML 2.0//EN" "http://www.wapforum.org/dtd/wml20.dtd">`| 此方法主要由自定义移动页面和控件适配器的开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同时参数和 URL 值的名称进行编码，以及它们之间插入等号 （=）。Both the name of the parameter and the URL value are encoded, and an equal sign (=) is inserted between them. 中的空间`name`或`value`字符串编码为加号 （+） 和等号 （=） 编码为 %3d。Spaces in the `name` or `value` strings are encoded as plus signs (+), and equal signs (=) are encoded as %3d.
